Definition at line 667 of file ht32f5xxxx_gpio.c.

void AFIO_GPxConfig ( u32  GPIO_Px,
u32  AFIO_PIN_n,
AFIO_MODE_Enum  AFIO_MODE_n 
)

Configure alternated mode of GPIO with specified pins.

Parameters:
GPIO_Px,:GPIO_PA ~ GPIO_PD.
AFIO_PIN_n,:This parameter can be any combination of AFIO_PIN_x.
AFIO_MODE_n,:This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • AFIO_MODE_DEFAULT : The default I/O function
  • AFIO_MODE_1 : Alternated mode 1
  • AFIO_MODE_2 : Alternated mode 2
  • AFIO_MODE_3 : Alternated mode 3
  • AFIO_MODE_4 : Alternated mode 4
  • AFIO_MODE_5 : Alternated mode 5
  • AFIO_MODE_6 : Alternated mode 6
  • AFIO_MODE_7 : Alternated mode 7
  • AFIO_MODE_8 : Alternated mode 8
  • AFIO_MODE_9 : Alternated mode 9
  • AFIO_MODE_10 : Alternated mode 10
  • AFIO_MODE_11 : Alternated mode 11
  • AFIO_MODE_12 : Alternated mode 12
  • AFIO_MODE_13 : Alternated mode 13
  • AFIO_MODE_14 : Alternated mode 14
  • AFIO_MODE_15 : Alternated mode 15
Return values:
None

Parameters:

Definition at line 77 of file ht32f5xxxx_gpio.c.

void GPIO_DirectionConfig ( HT_GPIO_TypeDef *  HT_GPIOx,
u16  GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,
GPIO_DIR_Enum  GPIO_DIR_INorOUT 
)

Configure the direction of specified GPIO pins.

Parameters:
HT_GPIOx,:where HT_GPIOx is the selected GPIO from the GPIO peripherals.
GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,:The port pins. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_PIN_x.
GPIO_DIR_INorOUT,:This parameter can be one of below:
  • GPIO_DIR_IN : The pins are input mode
  • GPIO_DIR_OUT : The pins are output mode
Return values:
None

Definition at line 551 of file ht32f5xxxx_gpio.c.

void GPIO_DriveConfig ( HT_GPIO_TypeDef *  HT_GPIOx,
u16  GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,
GPIO_DV_Enum  GPIO_DV_nMA 
)

Select the driving current of specified GPIO pins.

Parameters:
HT_GPIOx,:where HT_GPIOx is the selected GPIO from the GPIO peripherals.
GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,:The port pins. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_PIN_x.
GPIO_DV_nMA,:This parameter can be one of below:
  • GPIO_DV_4MA : Select output driving current as 4 mA
  • GPIO_DV_8MA : Select output driving current as 8 mA
  • GPIO_DV_12MA : Select output driving current as 12 mA
  • GPIO_DV_16MA : Select output driving current as 16 mA
Return values:
None

Definition at line 489 of file ht32f5xxxx_gpio.c.

void GPIO_PullResistorConfig ( HT_GPIO_TypeDef *  HT_GPIOx,
u16  GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,
GPIO_PR_Enum  GPIO_PR_x 
)

Configure the pull resistor of specified GPIO pins.

Parameters:
HT_GPIOx,:where HT_GPIOx is the selected GPIO from the GPIO peripherals.
GPIO_PIN_nBITMAP,:The port pins. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_PIN_x.
GPIO_PR_x,:Selection of Pull resistor. This parameter can be one of below:
  • GPIO_PR_UP : The pins with internal pull-up resistor
  • GPIO_PR_DOWN : The pins with internal pull-down resistor
  • GPIO_PR_DISABLE : The pins without pull resistor
Return values:
None
